say.name: CHEF:
say.says: You've got a lot of nerve showing yourself in FLAVOURVILLE!!!!

say.name: YOU:
say.says: I'm sorry Chef. I'm just looking for Kate. Do you know where she went?

say.name: CHEF:
say.says: You think I'M going to help YOU? HA! You STOLE my precious burger recipe and sold it to BurgerTown!

say.name: YOU:
say.says: I know and I'm sorry. Is there anything I can do to make it up to you?

say.name: CHEF:
say.says: Fine. if you can prove your cooking skills to me, then I'll tell you what I know about Kate. BUT FIRST! The ultimate test! THE CHEF'S FAMOUS BURGER RECIPE! The NOT BurgerTown Burger!
